flawed_nl_solution:
The farmer has 215 cows because 50 / 0.4 = <<50/0.4=215>>215
The farmer has 129 female cows because 215 x 0.6 = <<215*0.6=129>>129
The farmer will get 258 gallons of milk a day because 129 x 2 = <<129*2=258>>258
#### 258

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 125, not 215. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
